metadata.description: Full Stack developer, focused on creating amazing projects. Explore my portfolio and discover things like the stacks and tools I use daily, as well as some of my key projects. If it interests you, don't hesitate to get in touch.

about.title: About me
about.content: Hello, my name is Guilherme Rodrigues de Morais, a 19-year-old young man fascinated by the world of programming. My journey into this universe began over 5 years ago, with the creation of bots for Discord. However, it was in January 2024 that I dedicated myself body and soul to this area, embarking on a journey of learning and growth as a FullStack Developer. I fell in love with the versatility of FullStack development, which allows me to work on both the user interface and the logic behind it.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my main projects: Front-end, Back-end or Full-stack. See more on

my_portfolio_old.description: This is the project for the first version of my portfolio. Only using HTML, CSS and JS.

snake_game.description: A project where I followed a YouTube video. I did it just to get some basic notions at the time.

voting_topics.description: A RestFull API, where you can create topics about a subject, and within it, you can create multiple sessions, where the votes are stored.

test_lesser.description: A challenge for a job I was applying for. In short, the user has 15 seconds to fill out a form.

blog_post.description: A FullStack project, where basically the user can create their account and create posts. Another challenge.

stacks.title: Stacks and Tools
stacks.description: All the technologies and tools I use to develop my projects aim to provide solutions or streamline something in my project for me.
